extendedInfo.description: The first application of its kind on Android, never miss your bus again!This app uses the new real-time GPS data released by OC Transpo to allow you to track buses throughout the City of Ottawa.Stuck at a bus stop and wondering how far the bus is? Enter the 4 digit code, or let the GPS feature find you, and instantly see where your bus is and the estimated time of arrival. New notification feature lets you set a reminder, and the app will automatically notify you when the bus is at a time you specify!Rich map navigation lets you browse the city for stops, use the GPS to find all nearby stops, and add frequently used stops to your favorites. Displays enough data to let you see the next 3 trips for your bus stop, as well as the type of bus serving the route!Feel free to leave feedback or request features!

reviews.title: Decent app, some good potential left to develop
reviews.comment: Useful for figuring out how long I\'ll be waiting at the stop, but takes some futzing to do what I really want to do - trip planning.  With GPS it could be a great real-time-updated trip planner. Even just a feature to tell me when the bus I\'m on will get to a specific stop would be a great start.  However it\'s still a decent basic app for finding out where a given bus is, and worth the modest price for that.
reviews.author: Tim Furlong

reviews.title: Pretty awesome
reviews.comment: Works well and is very accurate. No more waiting long times wondering if I missed the bus or if its just running late.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worth the money
reviews.comment: I\'ve saved a lot of time and headaches from this app. It\'s good to know where the bus is & when it\'s coming so I can plan when to leave. I don\'t even call or check the schedule anymore. I just simply use this app.
reviews.author: Tabitha True

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Incredibly accurate oc transpo finally did something very well.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app. Makes taking the bus more enjoyable! B-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: GPS is not on the iPhone, bwahahaha!
reviews.comment: GPS is nice.
reviews.author: Chris Anderson

reviews.title: Tablet support??
reviews.comment: Awesome app, very helpful in trip planning...although, it crashes whenever I try using it on my android tablet.

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Could use trip planning function - can tell when bus is coming but not when I\'ll arrive!
reviews.author: Blake Strachan

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: Real Time tracking, I tested it. A few improvements required
reviews.author: Faizan Khan

reviews.title: Good stuff
reviews.comment: No complaints, only wish I could see multiple buses at once
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App - I use it daily
reviews.comment: I can\'t believe I use this app so much. I never feel in the dark about when the bus is coming now. I would give it 5 stars if the bus location refresh button wasn\'t tied to a soft button, and was reverted to how it was before, in the middle right hand corner of the map screen.  Regardless, amazing app, WELL worth the $.99
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I was tracking my bus and could see it coming down the street (exactly what my cellphone was telling me). Uses GPS to accurately locate busses and the simplistic menu is a breeze to navigate.  If you bus around in OC, invest the dollar in this app. You will love it.  HTC One S
reviews.author: Nic Fredette

reviews.title: Perfect - Missing Features
reviews.comment: This app is great. I use it everyday. Having a travel planner, and sometimes more accurate alerts would be nice. But will still give five stars since there are no problems and it works great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice app but notification feature doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: It is a very good app but I have to warn you the \"notify me\" feature DOES NOT WORK.
reviews.author: Ali Moosavi

reviews.title: Great app for use around the City
reviews.comment: I pretty much use this App every day.  Aside from some minor inconveniences (lack of caching) it\'s great for my needs.  If you are looking for a solid transit app for Ottawa Transit System, this is it!
reviews.author: Christopher Saunders

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: Keep up the good work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: I\'m very happy with the purchase. Everybody in Ottawa with smartphone should install thirds great app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: So much better than OCs\nGreat job
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Bus location is good, but ETA would be better. Stop info is good. No trip planner!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome very handy
reviews.comment: Love being able to see where busses are.   1 suggestion would be to allow a slightly bigger map on the bus tracking screen but on my s3 it does the trick
reviews.author: A Google User
